column5: it’s permanent dye but good news! someone’s coming tomorrow to fix it
thank you ;_; looking forward to when i can change it back
thank you <3 i’m getting better, thankfully
god me at my mom even though i’m literally diagnosed.
you’re calling me out!
me too, very scary

first time was last year, while i was in treatment for anorexia (were both male and struggle with an eating disorder) he was running a pro anorexia blog

most recent one is i discovered yet another account but it was more fucked. apparently he had been restricting more and bought a scale behind my back, was planning on killing someone who used to be my friend and he didn’t like (i was forced to stop being his friend), was telling people to kill themselves and bullied someone online to the point where they attempted suicide, planning on going to the pet store to buy a mouse and either preform a live dissection, crushing it to death, experimenting on it, or bleaching it. also talking shit about me and twisting my words to, what i think, make my friends dislike me (my friends followed it and no one told me except one person, after months of this account being up). there’s so much more but that’s just the highlights :( i told his psychiatrist and right now he’s in a residential treatment across the country

i had to do this after finding out some bad shit about my boyfriend. it’s so fucking hard and in a way i feel cheated on because he lied to me so much about such serious things that i didn’t find out about until two years in
yeah, i ended up throwing out all my stuff after i tried to die from it and got close
initially intent to die but then i chickened out. so it’s just self harm. rather deep cuts, but not too long
i’m awake
me last night
they don’t know i might tell my mom later
yes i took my sleep meds, i’m feeling a bit better. friend made me get out of bath and use butterfly bandages
i cut my leg up bad and almost passed out in the bath, i’m all patched up now my friend called me
can we talk?
i won’t die from it don’t worry if it gets too bad i might go to riley my brother
hit deep cut
no. i just hit styro for one allred’s i’m feeling scared
no, my mom step dad step bro and brother are here. i can’t go to them.
fuck what do i do? it’s filling up. i’m about to do it i’m scared. i’ll go ok. i just need to go hard. it’s a fresh razor. god i’m drunk as fuck
sitting here scared. i can’t believe it’s happening.
a little over 24 hours as of now
can i still get stitches if it’s a few days after?
wait i can’t PM pics without imgur :( thanks anyways though
okay! thank you
okay i’ll do that. thank you! right now since i’m out of things i have a nonstick wound pad thing (like a gauze) taped down with medical tape. not ideal, but better than something unsanitary

i was wrong it was styro thankfully

thank you so much!! doing those right now and going to store in a bit
it hit fat, it is gaping although it’s not crazy like some things you’ll see. i’m bad with measurements but maybe 1cm wide? planning on driving to the store in a sec to get bandages
my ex sent me a dollar through venmo to try and talk to me because i blocked him everywhere
tbh email youre doctor about this or tell your mom
me too
please do! that sounds delicious

thank you so much for taking the time to write all this out, this helped a lot

i’m currently doing CBT with my therapist but it’s for PTSD, i’ll ask if we can add this into it as well! i never thought about it. as well as this, i might be going into an out patient program
looks amazing. how did you poach your egg?? it’s so perfect

when i was weight restored i told a friend about my anorexia when it came up, she said “really? but you’re at a SUPER healthy weight right now!”

oof
almost always. then we sit in silence for a few minutes

just really really angry and lied to and betrayed. how could i have not noticed it? i gave him my all he was all i thought about. he would dissapear for hours on end and i would still be thinking about him when he wasn’t thinking about me. it’s just heartbreaking 

i know he loved me or i think he did maybe he didn’t. he told me he did. i don’t know what to believe anymore.
i emailed his psychiatrist about everything he said so hopefully she’ll tell the hospital and he will get the help he needs.
that’s a good way of putting it

i forgot to mention, yesterday he attempted suicide via overdosing and he’s in the hospital now (psych ward, this is his 3rd attempt on overdosing. he has done this with his other two breakups, same tactic)

i feel like it was my fault like he would have been okay if i wasn’t so selfish and i stayed with him
